page.title: 19SKERRIES COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Even though we live on an island communications with the outside are very good. There are 29 houses on the island and every house has a telephone About a third of the houses have{CB {radio}which can talk up to about 40 miles range. Most people use them to talk inside the island instead of the {phone}and also to keep in touch with the CB owners all over Shetland mainland. Another important thing is the{TV}to hear the news and comments from around the world and to see the programmes that the ordinary family watches and waits for, as do families all over Britain. Also a third of the households have video recorders. All the boats and some of the houses have{VHF radio.
